changeSet.author: srb55
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO CYNERGY.KRIM_PERM_T (PERM_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, PERM_TMPL_ID, NMSPC_CD, NM, DESC_TXT, ACTV_IND) VALUES(KRIM_PERM_ID_S.NEXTVAL,SYS_GUID(), 1, (select PERM_TMPL_ID from krim_perm_tmpl_t where NMSPC_CD='KR-NS' and nm='Full Unmask Field'), 'KFS-VND', 'Full Unmask Field ' || KRIM_PERM_ID_S.CURRVAL, 'Authorizes users to view the entire Foreign Tax Number on the Vendor Maintenance Document and Inquiry.' , 'Y') /
INSERT INTO CYNERGY.KRIM_PERM_ATTR_DATA_T (ATTR_DATA_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, PERM_ID, KIM_TYP_ID, KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID, ATTR_VAL) VALUES(krim_attr_data_id_s.NEXTVAL,SYS_GUID(), 1, KRIM_PERM_ID_S.CURRVAL, '11', '5', 'VendorDetail') / INSERT INTO CYNERGY.KRIM_PERM_ATTR_DATA_T (ATTR_DATA_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, PERM_ID, KIM_TYP_ID, KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID, ATTR_VAL) VALUES(krim_attr_data_id_s.NEXTVAL,SYS_GUID(), 1, KRIM_PERM_ID_S.CURRVAL, '11', '6', 'vendorHeader.extension.vendorForeignTaxNumber' ) / INSERT into KRIM_ROLE_PERM_T (ROLE_PERM_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, ROLE_ID, PERM_ID, ACTV_IND ) VALUES (KRIM_ROLE_PERM_ID_S.NEXTVAL,SYS_GUID(), 1, (select role_id from krim_role_t where NMSPC_CD='KFS-SYS' and role_nm='Tax Identification Number User'), KRIM_PERM_ID_S.CURRVAL, 'Y') / INSERT INTO CYNERGY.KRIM_PERM_T (PERM_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, PERM_TMPL_ID, NMSPC_CD, NM, DESC_TXT, ACTV_IND) VALUES(KRIM_PERM_ID_S.NEXTVAL,SYS_GUID(), 1, (select PERM_TMPL_ID from krim_perm_tmpl_t where NMSPC_CD='KR-NS' and nm='Full Unmask Field'), 'KFS-VND', 'Full Unmask Field ' || KRIM_PERM_ID_S.CURRVAL, 'Authorizes users to view the entire Global Intermediary Identification Number - GIIN on the Vendor Maintenance Document and Inquiry.' , 'Y') / INSERT INTO CYNERGY.KRIM_PERM_ATTR_DATA_T (ATTR_DATA_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, PERM_ID, KIM_TYP_ID, KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID, ATTR_VAL)
